narratives.question_text: How clearly did the instructor define the topic of study?
comments: Syllabus was clear and the goal of the class was presented clearly in the first meeting of the class.

narratives.question_text: How clearly did the instructor outline the expectation for the course, classroom activity and homework?
How well were individual class sessions prepared and presented?
comments: The lectures and powerpoints at the beginning of the class are excellent. Erich's style of lecturing and explaining material is very excellent. The projects and assignments were well organized and supported the topics that were discussed in class.

narratives.question_text: How well did lectures fit within the boundaries of the course?

comments: There could have been more hands on, or perhaps if I was paired with someone who knew less about the material already I would have learned more.

The workload was well balanced. The use of in-class lab time and outside of class time required to complete projects was well balanced. The paper assignments were never too large and strongly reinforced the topics of discussion.

narratives.question_text: How available was the instructor for help outside the classroom?
comments: Erich is always willing to help and very responsive when it comes to questions that come up in regards to projects.

narratives.question_text: How useful were assignments in furthering an understanding of the topic?
If tests were given, how fairly did they measure knowledge gained?
How useful was this course in preparing you for production work?
comments: I still feel like I would need assistance in setting up a control system, but would understand the larger components.
the only thing is that I now know how little i know about automation control.

I wouldn't say that we do as much controls system design as much as we do automation system design at YSD / YRT. That being said, I feel that the class prepares me extremely well for controls and system design work that I hope to be doing once graduating YSD. The fundaments of communications and networking provided in class are applicable to production work at YSD / YRT.

narratives.question_text: How would you evaluate the instructor's knowledge of the material?
Please offer additional comments on such topics as: what worked best about the course, suggested improvements, class materials, etc.
comments: Overall a very excellent course. Erich's knowledge of controls systems and ability to disseminate the material make it a very worthwhile course. The lab projects are incredibly fun and relevant to the types of things I hope to be doing in the future. The final project of the class is an excellent challenge and requires us to exercise all of the skills acquired throughout the class.
